Transliterator::__construct

(No version information available, might only be in SVN)

Transliterator::__construct — Construct a Transliterator object

Description

Transliterator::__construct() ( void )

Constructs a transliterator object.

Warning

This function is currently not documented; only its argument list is available.

Parameters

This function has no parameters.

Return Values

A transliterator object.

See Also

  • Transliterator::getErrorMessage() - Get last error message
  • Transliterator::create() - Create a transliterator
